IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE RESOURCES FOR THE JEWISH COMMUNITY IN OREGON AND SOUTHWEST WASHINGTON.
IRS990.MissionDescription: OJCF IS DEDICATED TO CREATING, PROMOTING, FACILITATING A CULTURE OF GIVING AND SERVES AS A PERMANENT REPOSITORY OF FUNDS AVAILABLE TO SAFEGUARD THE QUALITY OF JEWISH COMMUNAL LIFE IN OREGON AND SW WASHINGTON.
IRS990.Description: PROVIDED FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR ORGANIZATIONS THAT PROMOTE EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL, HEALTH, RELIGIOUS, AND SOCIAL NEEDS OF THE JEWISH COMMUNITY.

Assets Held in Charitable Gift Annuity

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Henry Blauer and Stan Blauer have a business relationship. Henry Blauer, Milt Carl, and Stan Geffen have a business relationship.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 4
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND BYLAWS WERE AMENDED TO CLARIFY THAT FUND MEMBERS WOULD NOT RECEIVE A DISTRIBUTION OF THEIR FUNDS IN THE EVENT OF DISSOLUTION OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ONE REPRESENTATIVE OF EACH 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION AND ONE REPRESENTATIVE OF EACH DONOR ADVISED FUND, CHARITABLE TRUST, SUPPORTING FOUNDATION, OR OTHER FUND THAT HAS ASSETS UNDER THE ORGANIZATION'S MANAGEMENT ARE MEMBERS WHO HAVE THE RIGHT TO ELECT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. 501(C)(3) MEMBERS WHICH HAVE AT LEAST $1 MILLION IN ASSETS HELD BY THE ORGANIZATION CAN DESIGNATE ONE TRUSTEE TO THE BOARD WITHOUT ELECTION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: 501(C)(3) AND FUND MEMBERS MAY ELECT TRUSTEES. 501(C)(3) MEMBERS WHICH HAVE AT LEAST $1 MILLION IN ASSETS HELD BY THE ORGANIZATION CAN DESIGNATE ONE TRUSTEE TO THE BOARD WITHOUT ELECTION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Changes to the organizations articles of incorporation must be approved by the foundation's members.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Provided by email and copies provided at board meetings.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A survey is completed annually and reviewed.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Comparative salary listings reviewed. COMPENSATION IS reviewed by the board and personnel committee.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
